name: PUCK RUNNER
description:
PUCK RUNNER is a challenging endless runner inspired by air hockey. Physically hit the puck to with your mouse to avoid obstacles, with your control of the puck being constantly threatened by ever-increasing speed and complexity.

TACTILE GAMEPLAY

Everything in-game from the puck, obstacles and even the mouse is a physics object with tactile, satisfying interactions and sounds.

TIME MANIPULATION

Puck Runner is simple to learn but tough to master, with a very high skill ceiling, Collecting energy allows you to slow down time to alllow you to regain control if you're in a tight spot, or speed up time to reach greater distances faster.

STEAM LEADERBOARDS

Compare your best distances and speeds with your friends and the community on Steam. Can you beat the rest?
